info.author: Zive Lai
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Python Software Foundation License
info.description:
django-autograph
================
Store signature in JSON format into db.
Functional code based on http://keith-wood.name/signature.html#java


Requirements
------------
1. jQuery Signature by kbwood (Keith Wood)
  https://github.com/kbwood/signature
2. Django 1.4+
3. South
4. Python Imaging Library (PIL)
  
  
Settings
--------
settings.py
  INSTALLED_APPS = (
      'autograph',
  )
  
  
Testing
-------
  python manage.py test autograph
  
  
Contact
-------
https://github.com/zivezab/django-autograph/issues
info.name: autograph
info.summary: A Django application for managing signature/autograph data.
